title: A red hot Huma Qureshi was all hearts for Ed Sheeran at the Brit Awards : Celebrity, News - India Today
text:
Celebrity A red hot Huma Qureshi was all hearts for Ed Sheeran at the Brit Awards Huma Qureshi just made her Brit Awards debut and needless to say, had an awful amount of fun. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Mini Dixit A + A - 
The 2017 edition of the Brit Awards was special for many reasons. While late music legend David Bowie was posthumously awarded two Brit Awards in the British male solo artist and Mastercard British Album categories, Coldplay and The Chainsmokers' much-awaited collaboration finally made it to the world. 
And soaking in all the magic was our very own, Huma Qureshi , who made her debut at the Brits. Qureshi who has been busy promoting her upcoming movie, Viceroy's House, made it to the coveted event and--needless to say--had the time of her life. 
Looking gorgeous in a red-hued outfit with her hair tied in a sleek ponytail, Qureshi, shared pictures and videos from her stint at the Brit Awards. At the #Brits2017 tonight ..ran post #ViceroysHouse promotions to make it ..best night ever pic.twitter.com/yO0k2p0Lu8 â€” Huma Qureshi (@humasqureshi) February 22, 2017 
"At the #Brits2017 tonight..ran post #ViceroysHouse promotions to make it ..best night ever," she tweeted.
